attributes.action: Force MPS caught in the expenses scandal to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ALL MPS OF ALL PARTIES WHO ARE CAUGHT IN EXPENSES SCANDAL TO RESIGN AND POLICE TO BE INFORMED.NO IFS,NO BUTS RESIGN

rejection.details:
Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/

Also, in any future petitions, please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
